attributes.action: toughen laws regarding knives and guns,,,anyone committing a murder using a gun or a knife should either be sentenced to death, or spend at least 30 years in prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the governmnet shuld be doing more to get guns and knives off our streets, at present there is no real deterent.  the laws should be strengthened to allow courts to impose the death penalty for murders involving guns and knives

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
